content: Morning Rohan, hope you had a good weekend. Neel wants to lock your Q1 Health Review call for Wed. Does 8:00 AM work?
Morning Ruby. 8 works, block 45 mins please.
Done. Invites sent. Will loop in Dr. Warren, Advik, Carla & Rachel.
Reminder ‚Äî in-person session tomorrow, 7 AM at your home gym. We'll walk through goblet squats, RDLs, and rows.
Yep, on my calendar. Looking forward to fixing my form.
Quick one ‚Äî how's Javier finding the updated protein plan? Any adjustments needed?
He's good with it. Greek yogurt in rotation, chicken skewers twice a week.
Perfect. We'll stick with that for now.
I'm outside ‚Äî ready when you are.
Coming down ‚Äî coffee in hand ‚òï
Great session. Your squat depth's improved; just keep bracing core. We'll check again in 2 weeks.
Noted. Feels more stable already.
Rohan ‚Äî Wed‚Äôs review will cover integrated plan v1.0 + Q2 goals. You‚Äôll hear from each expert for 5 mins, then Neel will wrap with KPIs.
Got it. Keep it tight; I‚Äôve a call at 8:50.
Morning all ‚Äî let‚Äôs start the Q1 Health Review. Big picture: you‚Äôve built strong habits; now we‚Äôll sharpen focus for Q2.
From the clinical side: goal is 15% ApoB reduction by next test. Keep current supplements; recheck lipids in 12 weeks.
Nutrition: maintain high-soluble fiber, 1.6g/kg protein, no processed seed oils. Javier‚Äôs executing well ‚Äî minimal tweaks.
Movement: stick to 3 strength + 2 Zone 2 sessions/week. Form from yesterday was strong.
Recovery: aim for +10% HRV avg and consistent 7+ hrs sleep. Keep alcohol ‚â§1 drink/session.
Q2 KPIs: ApoB ‚Üì15%, HRV ‚Üë10%, 3x strength/wk, 60 min Zone 2/wk. Thoughts?
All good ‚Äî let‚Äôs also track subjective mental focus. That‚Äôs big for me.
Agreed ‚Äî adding it. Will define a weekly self-rating scale.
Call done ‚úÖ Will send Health Optimization Plan v1.0 doc + goals summary within the hour.
Here‚Äôs the link to v1.0 plan: [secure link]. Summary attached. All goals locked for Q2.
Got it. Nicely pulled together üôè
How‚Äôs the first solo session with new lifts? Any sticking points?
Felt good, but rows might need lighter weight ‚Äî last set was shaky.
Drop 2.5 kg for now, rebuild form, then progress.
Any boredom with the current breakfast lineup yet?
Not yet. Javier‚Äôs rotating berries and tropical fruit ‚Äî keeps it fresh.
Perfect. That variety helps with micronutrients too.
Mobility drills update? Staying consistent?
5/7 days this week ‚Äî missed two early calls.
That‚Äôs solid. Aim for 6/7 next week ‚Äî even 5 mins counts.
Neel‚Äôs added the mental focus tracker to your weekly dashboard. Starts Monday.
Nice. Will log after my first strength session of the week.
Quick wrap-up: in-person session ‚úÖ, Q2 goals set, mental focus added. Anything urgent for next week?
Nope ‚Äî smooth week. Thanks for running point on everything.
Always a pleasure, Rohan. Enjoy the weekend! üå§Ô∏è
You too, Ruby üëç
